name: Droid
special_abilities: Droids do not need to eat, sleep, or breathe, and are unaffected by toxins and poisons.
Can train one rank in six career skills (instead of four)
Can train one rank in three specialization skills (instead of two)
Inorganic: Cannot use bacta, stimpacks, or Medicine checks for healing
Mechanical Being: Cannot become Force-sensitive or use Force powers
Starts with one rank in Enduring talent due to resilient metallic construction
